Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: "Early Years" and "Last Chapter". While giving viewers the background information of this complicated, poignant man, the movie made use of Symbolic design-based language to represent his beliefs as discordantly creative style based on his philosophies.
